verses.roman:
paḍitei haila mūrcchā, kichui nā jāne
kabhu ḍubāya, kabhu bhāsāya taraṅgera gaṇe

synonyms: paḍitei—falling down; haila mūrcchā—He became unconscious; kichui—anything; nā jāne—did not understand; kabhu—sometimes; ḍubāya—cause to sink; kabhu—sometimes; bhāsāya—float; taraṅgera gaṇe—the waves.
translation: Falling into the sea, He lost consciousness and could not understand where He was. Sometimes He sank beneath the waves, and sometimes He floated above them.
